title: NISER Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Senior Project Associate Post
description: The National Institute of Science Education and Research (NISER) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc., Ph.D can grab this chance and apply for the NISER Recruitment 2025 . Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the application...
